# vue-ts-demo

## Project setup
```
yarn install
```

### Compiles and hot-reloads for development
```
yarn run serve
```

### Compiles and minifies for production
```
yarn run build
```

### Run your tests
```
yarn run test
```

### Lints and fixes files
```
yarn run lint
```

### 资料参考

单元测试：
    https://www.cnblogs.com/yalong/p/11714393.html

    https://vue-test-utils.vuejs.org/zh/guides/#%E8%B5%B7%E6%AD%A5
